intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: ... Ugh...where am I? It's so dark... And I'm so tired...

intro.speaker: Flora
intro.line: Rise and shine, Lord/Lady Corrin!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Flora! I...I must be in my bedroom.

intro.speaker: Lilith
intro.line: Heehee! Of course, Lord/Lady Corrin. Where else? Anyway, I've prepared your horse for you. You have practice this morning!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Oh, Lilith, you're here too. But...I'm so sleepy. How late was I up last night?

intro.speaker: Lilith
intro.line: Well...

intro.speaker: Flora
intro.line: I know just the thing for a slugabed like you. ... Actually...never mind. I think you're going to have to wake up on your own for once.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: What's that supposed to mean? You seem...different somehow. Where's the ice magic I've come to know and loathe over the years? Come to think of it...where are Felicia and Jakob? They should be here...

intro.speaker: Flora
intro.line: Um...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Flora? What's wrong?

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Still in bed? Wake up, lazybones! Heehee!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Yes, your retainers have been awake and working on your behalf for hours.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Good morning, Xander. And Elise... Sorry, I don't know what's wrong with me today. I'm just exhausted!

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Well, you better get it together, or you'll be stuck in here forever!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: That's OK. As long as I have all of you with me, I'll always be happy. I don't mind staying here for the rest of my life.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Are you sure about that? Is that really what you want?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: What do you mean? Of course! And it's what Father wants for me, too.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Listen to me carefully, Corrin. What do you think Father's true intentions for you are?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: That's a weird question... I mean, he's my father! He gave me this castle and servants and raised me... Well, I mean, I guess you did most of the raising. But you know what I mean! He intends for me to follow in your footsteps, naturally! Remember? He gave me that special sword, and... And... NO!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Gods, I remember everything now... King Garon isn't my father! We...we were just battling in his throne room...

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: So you remember. What now?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Am...am I dead?

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: No. You can still go back. But you must make a decision. You can choose to remain here, with us. Or you can go back...and fight with your allies.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: My allies...

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: YOUR HERO IS DEAD. ADMIT DEFEAT NOW AND YOUR SUFFERING WILL BE MINIMAL.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: This is far from from over, Garon! Corrin still lives... I know it!

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: I, too, sense that Corrin is still present somehow...

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: VERY WELL. YOU HAVE BROUGHT THIS UPON YOURSELVES!

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: EEEE!

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: ARGHH!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Ryoma! Azura! They're all in danger!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Yes. They're all waiting for you, Corrin. They believe you will rise again and fight alongside them.

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: It's not your time, Corrin. Open your eyes. Let me hear you voice again!

intro.speaker: Felicia
intro.line: I just know you're coming back. You're stronger than anyone!

intro.speaker: Jakob
intro.line: Lord/Lady Corrin, of all the times I've asked you to wake... This is the most crucial of them all!

intro.speaker: Kaze
intro.line: I believe in you Lord/Lady Corrin. You can't die here.

intro.speaker: Silas
intro.line: Can you still hear my voice? Hang in there, Corrin!

intro.speaker: Mozu
intro.line: You're just playing dead, right? It's the oldest trick in the book.

intro.speaker: Shura
intro.line: I believe in you. Just like you believed in me. Come on back to us.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Come on, Corrin... Wake up! I know you can do it!

intro.speaker: Hinoka
intro.line: I won't give up, so you can't either!

intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: Are you gonna let this overgrown salamander take you out like that? Get up!

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: I won't leave your side, no matter what happens!

intro.speaker: Saizo
intro.line: Rise, Corrin. Your story cannot end this way.

intro.speaker: Kagero
intro.line: You've got to keep fighting, Corrin!

intro.speaker: Azama
intro.line: It is not your time to die, Corrin! Not for another 72 years and 19 days...

intro.speaker: Setsuna
intro.line: So you fainted. No big deal. Just get yourself together, and come back to us!

intro.speaker: Hinata
intro.line: You're stronger than this. Get up and fight like you always do.

intro.speaker: Oboro
intro.line: You can't die like this... You hair is all messed up!

intro.speaker: Hana
intro.line: I get it, you're taking a breather. Well, nap time's over—get up and fight!

intro.speaker: Subaki
intro.line: Perfection is in your grasp, Corrin!

intro.speaker: Rinkah
intro.line: Everyone believes in you. Your flame will go on forever!

intro.speaker: Orochi
intro.line: Your fate is not to die here. You will wake up!

intro.speaker: Kaden
intro.line: You can't die here, Corrin... I still haven't paid you back!

intro.speaker: Hayato
intro.line: This doesn't have to be the way it ends. Come on—let's finish this together!

intro.speaker: Kana
intro.line: Mama/Papa, don’t leave me! I promise I’ll be a good boy/girl from now on!! Please… *sniff*

intro.speaker: Shigure
intro.line: I do not wish to sing a requiem for you...

intro.speaker: Dwyer
intro.line: I know it's tempting to sleep forever, but you can't leave us like this!

intro.speaker: Sophie
intro.line: Why are you lying around like that? Wake up—we have work to do!

intro.speaker: Midori
intro.line: Don't give up! Hang on, and I'll whip up some medicine for you!

intro.speaker: Shiro
intro.line: I promise to keep fighting until you awaken. I won't give up, so you can't either!

intro.speaker: Kiragi
intro.line: Everything will be OK. It just has to be! I know you'll get up really soon!

intro.speaker: Asugi
intro.line: I should have been the one to take that hit! We still need you to lead us!

intro.speaker: Selkie
intro.line: Hey, dum-dum, if you die here, playtime is over FOREVER! So don't do it, OK?

intro.speaker: Hisame
intro.line: We've come too far to have the battle end like this...

intro.speaker: Mitama
intro.line: The flame of life burns / Truly, deeply...in your soul... / Awaken, my friend!

intro.speaker: Caeldori
intro.line: I want to fight at your side until the very end. You can't die!

intro.speaker: Rhajat
intro.line: You have to wake up... I can't follow you into death!

intro.speaker: Reina
intro.line: You can't die this way, Corrin! I want to hear you voice again.

intro.speaker: Scarlet
intro.line: I know you can open those eyes again, Corrin...

intro.speaker: Yukimura
intro.line: Lady Mikoto, if you can hear me... Please guide Corrin back to the living...

intro.speaker: Izana
intro.line: It wouldn't be a party without you, kid. So open those eyes, OK?

intro.speaker: Anna
intro.line: You’re a one-of-a-kind asset... No returns, if you catch my drift. So wake up already!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: My friends... I need to go back... I need to keep fighting!

intro.speaker: Flora
intro.line: Have you made up your mind, Lord/Lady Corrin?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Yes. I have to go back. It's so tempting to stay here forever with all of you... But the world needs me right now.

intro.speaker: Flora
intro.line: I'm so proud of you. You've grown into such a fine young man/woman. Go! Save your friends, and save the world from Garon. We will always be watching over you.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Thank you, Flora. I'm glad you could help me wake up one last time.

intro.speaker: Lilith
intro.line: None of us will ever forget you, Lord/Lady Corrin. I'll treasure every moment we spent together. The warmth of your hands when you rescued me that day... The feeling of comfort when I perched upon your shoulder. If you ever feel lonely, just know that I'm out there somewhere...thinking of you.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Lilith...you're going to make me cry. I will never forget you, either. Your bravery...and your kindness. Thank you for everything.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Be strong, Corrin! I love you more than anyone else in the entire world! Oh! Can you give a message to Leo and Camilla for me? This might be my only chance to tell then how much I love them... And there's so much I want to say... Just tell them that I'm always thinking of them and that I miss them. And they better not fight anymore, or I'll be angry! Heehee!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Of course, Elise. I love you too. I'll miss you...

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Time has stopped for us here, but you have so much more life to live, little prince/princess. You can accomplish what we couldn't. You can save this world. I urge you to seize the future! Do it for those of us who cannot. Go now. My beloved brother/sister...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Thank you, Xander. I finally understand why you made the choices you did. I won't let you down. I promise to make you proud no matter what!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Corrin...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Everyone... I must leave now. I know someday our paths will cross again. In this realm or beyond... ... I'm going back to fight, not just for me but for all of you too! Everyone is waiting for me... I won't give up. I won't let Garon win. Yato, give me your strength!

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: SO YOU AWAKEN...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Thank you, trusted Yato blade...

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Everyone, Corrin is revived!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I'm sorry for worrying you. Xander, Elise, and the others helped me find my way back to you. It's...hard to explain. But I'm back...and more determined than ever to end this war!

intro.speaker: Hinoka
intro.line: Yeah! Let's get 'em, Corrin!

intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: It's always all about you, isn't it... Just kidding, Brother/Sister. Let's do this.

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: I was so w-worried about you...

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: NO MATTER. THIS MERELY DELAYS THE INEVITABLE. READY YOUR SWORD, SO THAT I MAY SHATTER IT ANEW!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: We'll see...

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: WHAT?!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Hah! You see? Blazing Yato can never be destroyed! It is now fueled by the faith of Xander and Elise and everyone I love!

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: IMPUDENT FOOL!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: You're wrong, Garon. This is the path I chose, and you were always meant to be at the end of it. I WILL bring peace to the world and right all of your wrongs! And I'm not alone. We are all prepared to sacrifice ourselves for the greater good. That's true power. As you are about to find out!

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: THE ONLY THING I AM ABOUT TO FIND OUT... IS WHETHER YOUR BODY OR YOUR SWORD WILL BREAK FIRST!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Get ready, everyone. This is it. We can end this war RIGHT NOW. Join me! And fight for the salvation of Hoshido...and Nohr!

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: It's time, Corrin. I'm going to sing my song without restraint. You must act while its effects are at their strongest.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Wait—

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: No! Don't worry—and don't try to stop me. This is my destiny.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Very well. Just don't forget the promise you made to me.

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: I haven't forgotten. Believe me, I have no wish to disappear!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Then by all means, sing your heart out!

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: ...That's the first time you've ever done that.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Done what?

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Asked me to sing! It makes me happy to contribute to the cause.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Well, we need all the help we can get. But not at the expense of your life.

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: I know, I'm sorry to worry you... But here I go!

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: GRAAAAH! I CAN'T MOVE! NO MATTER. SIMPLE TRICKS LIKE THIS WILL NOT HELP YOU. ANANKOS! GREAT ONE! GIVE ME POWER!

boss.speaker: Garon
boss.line: HAH! NEVER FORGET THAT YOU CHOSE THIS PATH. YOU CHOSE DEATH AND DEFEAT. YOU CHOSE DOOM. YOUR DEATH IS AT HAND!

boss.speaker: Garon
boss.line: URGH! THESE WOUNDS! THIS CAN'T BE! I REFUSE TO ACCEPT DEATH! I REFU— GYAAAAH!

end.speaker: Garon
end.line: I should have killed you when I had the chance. When you were a mere child...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: And why didn't you, King Garon? Why... Tell me why, Father!

end.speaker: Garon
end.line: Because you were my most precious pawn. I knew I could use you to get Queen Mikoto. No matter. I feel at peace now. How long has it been since I felt like this? Perhaps this is what I wanted all along... The sweet release of death... My...my body was destroyed. My mind...lost... Ever since that moment...I became something... Something... ...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: What...just happened? What did he mean by that? Was he...already dead? Were those the delirious ramblings of a dying man...or something more? Xander did say that Father—I mean King Garon—had changed... I wonder...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Please tell me you didn't overdo it... You don't look good!

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: Ughh... I'm sorry, Corrin. I promised you I wouldn't disappear. But...I'm not sure...I can keep my word...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Please You can't just die like this! We did it, Azura! We made your dream come true. But what's it worth if you never experience it for yourself?

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: I'm at peace now, Corrin. I know that you and everyone else will be safe. That is worth everything. Will you listen to one more selfish request?

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: I want you to live a joyful life. Don't let this sour your victory.

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: The war is over, thanks to you. A world at peace... That's the world we dreamed of. That's the world I risked my life for. And it was worth it. So, it's your turn to make me a promise, Corrin...

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: Can I see you smile for me  one last time? One more smile...before I go.  That's right... Lovely...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: NO! I...I can't lose anyone else. I've lost so much... ...I will keep my promise, Azura. I won't let your sacrifice be in vain. Everyone... We have a lot of work ahead of us. Let's make this world a place we can be proud of again. When those who fell watch over us they'll know they can rest in peace. Azura... Sing for me again someday...

dialogue.speaker: Yukimura
dialogue.line: People of Hoshido! Let it be known that Ryoma, High Prince of Hoshido, has succeeded Queen Mikoto! He takes the throne at the cusp of a new era of peace in our land. Ryoma, please accept this crown as a symbol of your title.

dialogue.speaker: Ryoma
dialogue.line: Thank you, Yukimura. As king, I vow to uphold the values my mother represented so well. Justice. Charity. Equality. And above all else...peace. We shall lead the world into a new age of prosperity!

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Ryoma...has it even hit you? You're king!

dialogue.speaker: Sakura
dialogue.line: You look so r-regal! I'm so happy for you, Brother... *sniffle*

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Are you OK, Sakura? This should be a happy occasion...

dialogue.speaker: Sakura
dialogue.line: Yes, I know. I was just thinking of how happy this would make Mother...

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: I'm so sorry. But I think you're right. She is happy, wherever she is...

dialogue.speaker: Hinoka
dialogue.line: Yeah. She's probably watching over us right now, tearing up herself. *sniffle* Aw, damn it!

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: You too, Hinoka? We've got to pull ourselves together—at least until the end of the ceremony!

dialogue.speaker: Takumi
dialogue.line: He's/She's right. How does it look to people out there with us all sobbing up here?

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Quiet, everyone! I think Ryoma has a bit more to say...

dialogue.speaker: Sakura
dialogue.line: Shh!

dialogue.speaker: Ryoma
dialogue.line: Before you all leave, I have a few more words for you. With any war come casualties. But the casualties of this war have been almost too much to bear. I speak, of course, of our beloved Queen Mikoto. Still, we must move forward. The crisis our world faced is finally at an end. And in this moment, we have done something extraordinary... We have made peace with the kingdom of Nohr! I know some of you here today probably find it hard to swallow. But there can be no light without dark. The two complement each other... And so, too, do the two greatest kingdoms there ever were. They each have something the other lacks and together are made whole. We in Hoshido must share our light and our bounty. We have much to learn from our brothers and sisters at Nohr. Let us live...together. Let us move forward on the same path toward a brighter future. Thank you for your time, and may the gods bless you.

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Well spoken, Ryoma. *sob*

dialogue.speaker: Sakura
dialogue.line: Hah! He got you, too.

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: No, I just some smoke in my eyes...

dialogue.speaker: Hinoka
dialogue.line: It's OK. We all did.

dialogue.speaker: Takumi
dialogue.line: AHEM. Speak for yourself, Sister.

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Hah! At lease we can count on Takumi to bring us back to reality.

dialogue.speaker: Yukimura
dialogue.line: Excuse me, but the ceremony is not quite over...

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: I'm so sorry, Yukimura. Please continue.

dialogue.speaker: Yukimura
dialogue.line: This concludes the coronation ceremony! May Hoshido and King Ryoma reign in glory forever.

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: That was a wonderful speech, Ryoma. I just hope all the crying didn't distract you too much.

dialogue.speaker: Ryoma
dialogue.line: Thank you, Corrin. No, I didn't even notice. Hopefully you didn't notice how nervous I was up there.

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: You, nervous? I don't believe it! You looked right in your element. Bold and regal, befitting your new title.

dialogue.speaker: Ryoma
dialogue.line: Really? Well, thank you. That's reassuring.

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Yes, It was quite a moment what Yukimura handed you the crown.

dialogue.speaker: Camilla
dialogue.line: Oh yes. Even I was moved. Not to tears, mind you...

dialogue.speaker: Leo
dialogue.line: I had no idea the Hoshidan royals were such softies.

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Camilla! Leo! I'm so glad you could make it today.

dialogue.speaker: Leo
dialogue.line: Of course. It wouldn't do for Hoshido's newest allies to miss Ryoma's coronation, would it?

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Well, I suppose not. But I know you've both been busy since the way ended. I'm so happy to see both of you!

dialogue.speaker: Leo
dialogue.line: You too, Corrin. Although I can't say I'm fully comfortable walking around Hoshido just yet.

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Leo, I assure you—

dialogue.speaker: Camilla
dialogue.line: Oh please, Leo. What about when you were milling around the outdoor market this morning? Remember? You were going on about how great it was to see Corrin again?

dialogue.speaker: Leo
dialogue.line: Camilla!

dialogue.speaker: Camilla
dialogue.line: Ahaha! Anyway, it's wonderful to see you, Corrin. But I must admit that the loss of Xander and Elise still weighs heavily on me... How are you holding up?

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: I think about them every day. Their deaths will be a burden I carry for the rest of my life.

dialogue.speaker: Ryoma
dialogue.line: I'm so sorry for your loss. Those who fell in the war will never be forgotten. We won't easily forget how many lives were lost to Hoshidan blades... All we can do to atone is prevent such a war from ever happening again.

dialogue.speaker: Camilla
dialogue.line: Right you are.

dialogue.speaker: Ryoma
dialogue.line: Were it within my power as king, my first act would be to bring back your siblings. And Azura as well...

dialogue.speaker: Sakura
dialogue.line: Oh...I miss Azura so much...

dialogue.speaker: Hinoka
dialogue.line: I didn't spend enough time with her when she was alive... *sniffle*

dialogue.speaker: Takumi
dialogue.line: Again with the crying? Look, it may have taken me a while to warm up to Azura, but in the end... I..I really miss her, too. *sniffle*

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Now we've done it. Even Takumi is crying.

dialogue.speaker: Leo
dialogue.line: You guys are going to need to hold it together at my coronation, OK? We can't have all Nohr thinking that Hoshidans are moved so easily to tears.

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: YOUR coronation? But I thought Camilla was next in line...

dialogue.speaker: Camilla
dialogue.line: Oh, that was supposed to be a surprise! You ruined it, Leo! To answer your question... Yes, I am next in line for the crown. But I begged Leo to take my place, and he has graciously accepted. I have no desire to run a kingdom.

dialogue.speaker: Leo
dialogue.line: So there you have it. You should know that I have big plans for Nohr. I think a friendly competition with Hoshido will be good for both of us. And on that note, I'm quite busy...so it's time I said my good-byes.

dialogue.speaker: Camilla
dialogue.line: I'll join you. Everyone, I look forward to seeing you at the coronation ceremony in Nohr!

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Thank you, Camilla. We'll be there. And off they go...

dialogue.speaker: Ryoma
dialogue.line: Yes, but you'll see them again soon. They are your siblings, after all.

dialogue.speaker: Hinoka
dialogue.line: Too bad they're leaving so soon. They're going to miss the festival!

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Hmm?

dialogue.speaker: Hinoka
dialogue.line: That's right...I forgot you've never seen a Hoshidan festival before. It's kind of like...the biggest party you can imagine. So put all those sad feelings on the back burner...and get ready to DANCE!

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Thank sounds like just the thing. We could all stand to let off some steam.

dialogue.speaker: Sakura
dialogue.line: Oh, it's been so long since we've had a proper festival... I can w-wait!

dialogue.speaker: Takumi
dialogue.line: Just try not to embarrass yourselves this time, guys. You're members of the royal family!

dialogue.speaker: Ryoma
dialogue.line: Need I remind you of a certain incident not so long ago? ...Involving you dancing on stage with a band of musicians? I kid, Brother. Hmm...it would behoove me to make an offering on Mother's behalf at some point. Perhaps some vendor is selling those sweet rice dumplings she used to love...

dialogue.speaker: Felicia
dialogue.line: This is going to be great! How can I help?

dialogue.speaker: Jakob
dialogue.line: Let's just make sure the crowds don't get too rowdy. Other than that, we're on official orders to have a good time!

dialogue.speaker: Silas
dialogue.line: Nohrians and Hoshidans...partying together. What has the world come to?

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Thank you, everyone. Having all of you by my side fills my heart with joy. Now, please. I've heard enough about peace and justice and the future. As Hinoka said, let's have some fun for once!

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Whew...they weren't kidding about the festival. I'm exhausted. Maybe I should take a little break... It's all just a bit overwhelming. Hmm... This place seems familiar... Oh! It's where I first met Azura. Oh, Azura...

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Am I hearing things?! That's her song!

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Azura! Maybe I'm just hallucinating due to the exhaustion, but I don't care. I'm so glad to see you!

dialogue.speaker: Azura
dialogue.line: Shh.

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: ...Azura?

dialogue.speaker: Azura
dialogue.line: Tell me, Corrin. What do you see in this lake?

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Just water, I suppose. What am I supposed to see?

dialogue.speaker: Azura
dialogue.line: I think if you look carefully, you might sense something deeper... Empty your mind of thoughts, and let yourself be in the moment.

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Well, OK...

dialogue.speaker: Azura
dialogue.line: Good. Keep you focus on the lake. Don't look away.

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: But, I have so much I want to say...

dialogue.speaker: Azura
dialogue.line: Not now. Just do as I ask.

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Very well. ... I'm sorry, but I have to get this off my chest. I want to thank you for everything you've done. You're the most selfless person I've ever known, and I just... Wait Azura? *sigh*

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Maybe my mind was just playing a trick on me...

dialogue.speaker: Azura
dialogue.line: Thank you for your bravery, Corrin. I hope we can meet again someday...

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Azura...if you can hear me... ... I'm sure we will meet again. Somehow. Until then...I will never forget you.

dialogue.speaker: Ryoma
dialogue.line: Corrin, what are you doing out here all by yourself? Don't tell me you're calling it a night. The festival is still going strong!

dialogue.speaker: Corrin
dialogue.line: Heh. I was just taking a breather. You guys sure know how to celebrate. You can tell everyone I'll be right back. I just need a few more minutes to dream...

cutscene.speaker: Hinoka
cutscene.line: You know, I always wanted to take you flying.

cutscene.speaker: Sakura
cutscene.line: Hello, hello! How's the view up there?  Hey!

cutscene.speaker: Ryoma
cutscene.line: I told Mother...the war is over.

cutscene.speaker: Ryoma
cutscene.line: You stood for peace. Always. We carry on your legacy.

cutscene.speaker: Ryoma
cutscene.line: That said...our task will always be a difficult one.

cutscene.speaker: Ryoma
cutscene.line: But no matter how hard it may be...

cutscene.speaker: Ryoma
cutscene.line: We will succeed...with you at our side.
